query.description: default by now if not present
default is createdAt if not present
defailt is desc if not present (desc or asc)

body.raw:
{
    "contestId": 1,
    "title": "title",
    "author": "fullname",
    "createdAt": "datetime",
    "numComments": 10,
    "maxRegister": 10,
    "currRegister": 8,
    "tags": ["tag1", "tag2"],
    "description": "",
    "registrationDeadline": "datetime",
    "banner":"",
    "content": "",
    "rounds": [
        {
            "startsAt": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS",
            "endsAt": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS",
            "contraints": {
                "attendeePercent": 50, // default 100
                "scorePercent": 88, // default 0
                "maxAttempts": 5 // consider to dev
            },
            "challenges": [
                "slug-challenge-title-1"
            ],
            "status": false // false if not start or ended
        }
    ]
}
